export const Table = ({ col1, col2, col3, col4, display, status, error, mapProps, dataArr }) => { return ( <> { col4 ? : null } { status && display && error ? (status === 'loading' ? : status === 'succeeded' && display.results ? display.results.map((item, i) => { mapProps.four ? : null } ) : status === 'succeeded' && display.error ? : status === 'failed' && error ? : null) : dataArr ? dataArr.map((item, i) => { mapProps.four ? : null } ) : null }
# {col1} {col2} {col3}{col4}
# Loading... Loading... Loading...
{i + 1} {item[mapProps.one]} {item[mapProps.two]} {item[mapProps.three]}{item[mapProps.four]}
# Oh no! looks like {display.error.toLowerCase()}
# Oh no! looks like {error}
{i + 1} {item[mapProps.one]} {item[mapProps.two]} {item[mapProps.three]}{item[mapProps.four]}
) }
